roleset.name: to precede, come before something else

role.descr: Preceder, thing antedating/coming before sth else

example.name: All arguments
example.text: The Peruvian empire antedates the Mexican empire.

roleset.note: ANTEDATE-V NOTES: Roleset based on project ULA-MASC-1-rest. Comparison to 'precede', no VN entry. Framed by Claire. (from antedate.01-v)
